title: Between Dinner and the Morning After
description: Although it's taking her eccentric boss forever to give Abi a break, its fine — at least she's got a job. It pays the shopping bills and keeps her busy.Although she's no longer happy with her boyfriend, it's cool — he's perfect for her mother and her friends.That is, until someone she was in love with eight years ago returns to the picture.Suddenly, it all boils down to the past vs. the present: Current okay life or the possibility of something better?She has overnight to decide.
author: Tara F.T. Sering
